column4: Hi, I have windows 7 installed on a VB, how can browse files on a usb flash disc on the VM?
it involves creating a virtual proxy object as root (then requiring you to run VB as root)
you also need to be using the non OS version of virtualbox.
the other option (if your HOST is linux) is to simply created a VB shared folder for /media, then when you plug in your usb drive in the HOST machine that folder will contain the usb drive
